session_events.fact: Session 1 begins. Saul is escorting Gundren Rockseeker's supply wagon from Neverwinter to Phandalin along the Triboar Trail. Gundren and Sildar Hallwinter rode ahead on horseback.
Saul ambushed by 4 goblins at the dead horses. Killed one with Hellish Rebuke but was dropped by arrows while fleeing. Goblins stole the wagon and supplies. Saul stabilized on the road.

combat.fact: Combat: Saul vs 4 goblins at Triboar Trail ambush site
